scripts.createLambdaZip: rm -rf packages/infrastructure/lambda.zip && cd packages/service && npm run release && cp build/lambda.zip ../../packages/infrastructure
scripts.buildWebApp: rm -rf build && cd packages/webApp && npm run build && cp -r build ../..
scripts.deployInfrastructure: npm run createCodeZip && npm run createLambdaZip && cd packages/infrastructure && npm run release
scripts.createCodeZip: rm -rf codeZip code.zip && mkdir codeZip && npm run copyCode && cd codeZip && zip -r ../code.zip . && cd ..
scripts.copyCode: mkdir -p codeZip/packages/infrastructure && cp -r packages/infrastructure/*.ts packages/infrastructure/*.json codeZip/packages/infrastructure && mkdir -p codeZip/packages/service && cp -r packages/service/lib packages/service/*.json codeZip/packages/service && mkdir -p codeZip/packages/webApp && cp -r packages/webApp/public packages/webApp/src packages/webApp/*.json codeZip/packages/webApp && cp *.json codeZip
scripts.startLocalWebApp: cd packages/webApp && npm i && npm run start
